name: Yuhang
text:
Heheheh.
How was my specialty dish?
Did I make a little too much?

name: Yuhang
text:
...From the looks of it,
you seem to have liked it—!
My skills aren't bad, are they?

name: Yuhang
text:
With this, the promise has been perfectly fulfilled—!
[Player] helped me a lot in Muirauka IV, after all—!

name: Yuhang
text:
Believe it or not,
I'm incredibly grateful to you, [Player]—?

name: Yuhang
text:
Well, even if there wasn't a promise,
I'd want to make delicious food for [Player] anytime—!

name: Yuhang
text:
Come on, the long-awaited
dessert after the meal—!
Please savor it carefully—!

—Carried before [Player] was
chocolate that shimmered in seven colors.

name: Yuhang
text:
For [Player], who always works hard as an operator,
I gathered tons of energizing ingredients—!

name: Yuhang
text:
When I finely crushed and kneaded them into the cacao,
they turned into a beautiful rainbow color—?
It's super colorful and looks great, right—!

name: Yuhang
text:
Don't worry about that—!
I've tasted it properly,
and confirmed it's safe—!

Though the chocolate was of a color not typically seen in food,
the fragrant cacao aroma proclaimed its edible nature.

Taking a bite with resolve,
a complex aroma and bittersweet harmony spread exquisitely in their mouth.

name: Yuhang
text:
See—? It was delicious, right—?
It's fun to try various things—!
They say "nothing ventured, nothing gained"—!

name: Yuhang
text:
...Oh?
[Player] also has something
they want to give me to eat—?

name: Yuhang
text:
This is... oh, wow!
This is chocolate too—!
We seem to be on the same wavelength—!

name: Yuhang
text:
W-wait a minute...!
This careful packaging, could it be,
that you are "serious" about this...?

name: Yuhang
text:
N-no way...!
I didn't think I'd receive chocolate
from [Player]—

name: Yuhang
text:
I'm, I'm super happy, [Player].
Thank you!

name: Yuhang
text:
...Oh—!?
It's moist and smooth,
and super delicious—!

name: Yuhang
text:
Along with the sweetness,
a happy feeling
spreads throughout my mouth—!

name: Yuhang
text:
...This might also be one of the "Delicacy of Happiness"
I've been searching for—
I feel that way—

name: Yuhang
text:
...Saying this now is against the rules,
or rather, it's unfair, but—

name: Yuhang
text:
About that chocolate earlier—
I actually had "that intention" too—?

Yuhang's cheeks were faintly flushed red,
as he softly murmured in a quieter voice than usual.
